flare volley.name: Flare Volley
flare volley.desc: Conjure up to 3 fireballs to volley at your enemies.

burning servants.name: Burning Servants
burning servants.desc: Summon a legion of flaming spearmen that lunge inwards.

flaming scourge.name: Flaming Scourge
flaming scourge.desc: Conjure a flaming whip and sling your foes around and into the ground with a devastating slam.

fire forge.name: Fire Forge
fire forge.desc: Conjure flaming daggers and throw them forwards.

searing snare.name: Searing Snare
searing snare.desc: Place a fiery snare at a chosen location. Enemies that stumble into it are scorched.

flame repulsion.name: Flame Repulsion
flame repulsion.desc: Charge up an exertion of flames that knocks opponents backwards. If you take damage while charging, you repulse it back.

relentless flames.name: Relentless Flames
relentless flames.desc: Bear down on your foes with repeated fiery slashes.

ash slam.name: Ash Slam
ash slam.desc: Strike the ground, turning it to ash.

fire gun.name: Fire Gun
fire gun.desc: Shoot successive bullets of fire from your fingertips.

fire blade.name: Fire Blade
fire blade.desc:
Release a slash of flames downwards that deals heavy posture damage.
[*Guard breaks at Level 5]

flame ballista.name: Flame Ballista
flame ballista.desc: Conjure a flaming arrow and fire it at your target.

flame grab.name: Flame Grab
flame grab.desc: Jet forwards with flames and slam anyone you catch in your clutches.
